佔成率不可空白: Please enter Rolling %. If not set, please enter [0].

此帳戶為配碼帳戶: This account is payout tax account.

轉碼數超過上線,用戶須自行承擔差額,確定要繼續嗎?: If Rolling % exceeds the upline, you have to pay the difference. Do you agree?
下線轉碼率不可高於上線: The downline's rolling % cannot exceed your own. Please reset.
佔成/轉碼請輸入正確數字: Please enter the correct number for sharing/rolling rate.
至少需新增一組Ewin百家樂錢包: Please add at least one wallet first.

Account cannot start with BMH, please use another account.
if you have any questions, please contact customer service.
注意!!各幣別的百家樂錢包為[主要錢包]，若將該幣別的百家樂錢包關閉，則無法使用: Attention! Each currency's Baccarat wallet is the MAIN WALLET. If you close the MAIN WALLET, you can't play games with that currency!
